src:
FOTO: Dončiću v Clevelandu kuhali Prekmurci
Po Lukovi briljantni predstavi proti Cavaliersom je njega in še 159 gostov razvajala gostilna Rajh. Američani prvič okusili bograč in prekmursko gibanico.
05 Nov 2019, 10:28 by Oste Bakal



Leon in Damir Pintarič sta po tekmi razvajala Luko Dončića.



Košarkarski zvezdnik se je posladkal s prekmursko gibanico in renskim rizlingom.



Vzdušje po tekmi v ameriškem mestu z največ Slovenci je bilo izjemno.



Pogostitev so priredili v klubu legend.



Tako so pripravljali znamenito prekmursko sladico.


CLEVELAND/BAKOVCI – Čeprav je Dallas razglašen za kulinarično destinacijo leta v ZDA, to še ne pomeni, da tačas najbolj znani Slovenec, ki živi tam, Luka Dončić, uživa samo tamkajšnjo hrano. Tako je bilo tudi včeraj, po srednjeevropskem času v zgodnjih jutranjih urah, v Clevelandu pa je bil večer, ko je po tekmi NBA med Dallas Mavericks in Cleveland Cavaliers za večerjo poskrbela ekipa znane prekmurske Gostilne Rajh.Sin in oče, Leon in Damir Pintarič, sta s svojimi sodelavci že med tekmo začela pripravljati številne prekmurske dobrote. Kot


Košarkarski zvezdnik se je posladkal s prekmursko gibanico in renskim rizlingom.

nam je povedala direktorica gostilne iz Bakovcev, Tanja Pintarič, so v VIP-prostoru postregli kar 160 ljudi, z junakom večera Luko Dončićem na čelu. Prav on je bil namreč najbolj zaslužen za to, da so gostje iz Dallasa suvereno zmagali, z 20 točkami naskoka.Košarkarji in vipovci so se lahko pogostili s samimi domačimi jedmi, nekaj posebnega za Američane sta bila vsekakor bograč in prekmurska gibanica, s katero so se vsi posladkali. Pomembno zmago so seveda zalili s slovensko vinsko kapljico, z odličnim Protnerjevim renskim rizlingom.Kdo ve, koliko so na igro našega čudežnega dečka vplivale vonjave izza dvorane, a spet je bil najboljši igralec. In to ravno v


Vzdušje po tekmi v ameriškem mestu z največ Slovenci je bilo izjemno.

Clevelandu, ki je ameriško mesto z izjemnim številom slovenskih priseljencev. Vsem sonarodnjakom iz ZDA kot tudi gostincem iz Bakovcev se je za navijanje oddolžil tako, da je moštvo Dallas Mavericks popeljal do visoke zmage (131:111), pri tem je pomagal z veličastnim trojnim dvojčkom in dosegel 29 točk. Mimogrede, to je bil njegov enajsti trojni dvojček, odkar se je lani preselil v Teksas. S tem je znova dokazal, da je v tem trenutku eden najbolj razigranih in raznovrstnih košarkarjev v najmočnejši ligi na svetu. 


Pogostitev so priredili v klubu legend.



Tako so pripravljali znamenito prekmursko sladico.

29točk je Dončić dosegel na tekmi.
text:
PHOTO: Doncic in Cleveland Cooked by Prekmurks
After Luke's brilliant performance against the Cavaliers, he and 159 guests were spoiled by the Reich Inn. For the first time Americans tasted burgach and Prekmurje gibanica.
05 Nov 2019, 10:28 by Oste Bakal



Leon and Damir Pintaric pampered Luka Doncic after the match.



The basketball superstar has a treat with the Prekmurje gibansko and Rhine Riesling.



The atmosphere after the race in the American city with the most Slovenes was extraordinary.



The event was hosted at the Legends Club.



Thus, they prepared the famous Prekmurje dessert.


CLEVELAND / BAKOVCI - Although Dallas has been named the Culinary Destination of the Year in the US, that does not mean that the famous Slovene who lives there, Luka Doncic, only consumes food there. And so it was yesterday, Central European time in the early hours of the morning, and in Cleveland, it was the evening when a team of the renowned Prehurst Inn Reich. he and his colleagues started preparing many Prekmurje delicacies during the race. As


The basketball superstar has a treat with the Prekmurje gibansko and Rhine Riesling.

the director of the Bakovci tavern, Tanja Pintaric, told us that as many as 160 people were served in the VIP area, with the hero of the evening Luka Doncic at the helm. Namely, he was the most deserving of sovereign victories for the Dallas guests, with 20 points on the jump. everyone sweetened. Of course, they won a significant victory with a Slovenian wine drop, with the excellent Protner Rhine Riesling.Who knows how much the smell of our boy was influenced by the smell from behind the hall, but again he was the best player. And that's exactly in


The atmosphere after the race in the American city with the most Slovenes was extraordinary.

Cleveland, which is an American city with an impressive number of Slovenian immigrants. He cheered the United States as well as the Bakovci caterers by cheering on the Dallas Mavericks for a high win (131: 111), assisting with a magnificent triple-double, scoring 29 points. By the way, this was his eleventh triple-double since he moved to Texas last year. With this, he has proven once again that he is one of the most playful and diverse basketball players in the most powerful league in the world at the moment.


The event was hosted at the Legends Club.



Thus, they prepared the famous Prekmurje dessert.

Doncic scored 29 points in the race.
